solution_line_template: Before their aunt gave them money, Jade and Julia had a total of ${jade_money} + ${julia_money} = $<<{jade_money}+{julia_money}={money_before_aunt}>>{money_before_aunt}.
So, the total amount that their aunt gave them was ${total_money_after_aunt} - ${money_before_aunt} = $<<{total_money_after_aunt}-{money_before_aunt}={total_given_by_aunt}>>{total_given_by_aunt}.
Thus, each of them was given ${total_given_by_aunt}/{number_of_sisters} = $<<{total_given_by_aunt}/{number_of_sisters}={amount_per_sister}>>{amount_per_sister}.
